      • SimulatorHandler

        public SimulatorHandler(Agenda agenda,
                        PodiumManager podiumManager,
                        ArtistManager artistManager)

      • SimulatorHandler

        private SimulatorHandler(Agenda agenda,
                         PodiumManager podiumManager,
                         ArtistManager artistManager,
                         TileMap tileMap)
        Top constructor for SimulatorHandler.
        Parameters:
        agenda - a class containing all of the information about created shows
        podiumManager - the manager containing all the created podiums
        artistManager - the manager containing all the created Artists
        tileMap - the TileMap to set this.tileMap to

    • Method Detail

      • reset

        public void reset(Agenda agenda)
        Resets the different parts that need to be changed after a change in this.agenda.

        The different parts that are changed are:

        • this.agenda to the new changed Agenda.
        • generateObjects()
        • generatePodiumHashMap()
        • this.time to 00:00.
        • Resets all the NPCs
        Parameters:
        agenda - Agenda That is loaded into the simulator

      • generatePodiumHashMap

        private void generatePodiumHashMap()
        Looks trough all the SimulatorPodiums to find the corresponding Podium.

        Adds the Podium to the this.podiumObjectHashMap.

      • generateObjects

        private void generateObjects()
        Scans through the Layers in this.tileMap.

        Creates the following objects:

        • All the SimulatorPodiums in the list.
        • The Spawn object in this.spawn.
        • All the other normal SimulatorObject

      • draw

        public void draw(org.jfree.fx.FXGraphics2D g2d)
        Draws this.tileMap, all the NPCs and the objects to the given screen.
        Parameters:
        g2d - the object to draw to

      • update

        public void update(double deltaTime)
        Updates all the NPCs and the objects to the given screen.
        Parameters:
        deltaTime - the time it took since last update

      • setupNPC

        private void setupNPC(double timePast)
        Handles spawning NPCs.
        Parameters:
        timePast - the time spend since last update

      • spawnNPC

        private void spawnNPC()
        Creates a new NPC at a rondom location at this.spawn.

      • spawnAllArtistNPCs

        private void spawnAllArtistNPCs()
        Spawns new NPC on the spawn place. Makes sure there is no collision between NPCs

        The amount of NPCs spawned is based on the set amount

      • checkShows

        private void checkShows()
        Checks if, since last check, shows have started or ended.

        Calls onShowStart(Show) or onShowEnd(Show) if shows have started or ended respectively.

      • onShowStart

        private void onShowStart(Show show)
        Handles all the action that need to happen when a new shows starts playing.
        Parameters:
        show - The show that started

      • onShowEnd

        private void onShowEnd(Show show)
        Handles everything that needs to happen when a show has ended.
        Parameters:
        show - The show that ended

        Returns:
